gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 135, Thunder 100
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics win their third in a row as they defeated the Thunder, 135-100. Kristaps Porzingis led Boston with 27 points, 12 rebounds, and five blocks while Jayson Tatum (24 points, seven rebounds) and Jaylen Brown (23 points, seven rebounds, four assists) totaled 47 points. Josh Giddey led the Thunder with 17 points and six rebounds in the loss. The Thunder moved to 52-24. With their win tonight, Boston moves to 60-16, clinching the best overall record in the NBA, ensuring them a home court advantage throughout the Playoffs.
